## Constitution Compliance (MANDATORY)

- [ ] CHK001 MCP tool with JSON schema (if feature adds functionality)
- [ ] CHK002 Tests written before implementation (TDD - Red-Green-Refactor)
- [ ] CHK003 Security review for command injection or secrets handling
- [ ] CHK004 Privacy review for data storage and retention
- [ ] CHK005 Observability (debug mode, structured logs, confidence scores)
- [ ] CHK006 Simplicity check (YAGNI - no unnecessary complexity)

## Security & Privacy

- [ ] CHK007 Dangerous command blocklist checked and updated if needed
- [ ] CHK008 Password/secret redaction patterns validated
- [ ] CHK009 File permissions set to 0600 for logs and sensitive data
- [ ] CHK010 Audit logging for any command injection functionality
- [ ] CHK011 No cross-user data access possible
- [ ] CHK012 Retention policy documented and automated cleanup implemented

## Testing & Quality

- [ ] CHK013 Unit tests for all detection patterns/logic
- [ ] CHK014 Integration tests for session lifecycle
- [ ] CHK015 Security tests for safety-critical features
- [ ] CHK016 Manual test cases documented for real sessions
- [ ] CHK017 Performance tests validate <100ms detection latency
- [ ] CHK018 Test coverage >80% for core modules

## Documentation

- [ ] CHK019 MCP tool reference updated with new/changed tools
- [ ] CHK020 README updated if user-facing changes
- [ ] CHK021 Example usage provided for new functionality
- [ ] CHK022 Architecture documentation reflects changes
- [ ] CHK023 Constitution compliance documented in PR description

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
